data.name: Eloquence Demo
data.detailed_description:
In honor of Eloquence's placement as a finalist for the SOWN (State of Wonder Night) as part of the Tokyo Game Show, we are making a public demo available to all lovers of language, games, and colorful art!

Play around in two demo levels that showcase most features that are currently implemented in the pre-alpha.
We hope you have fun, while the team continues to add more functionalities and mechanics.

Fun fact: the demo contains 18500 unique interactions with the islanders!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD 5670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
